TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit OracleDateTime extends System.ValueType implements class System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable, class System.IComparable

Docs.summary: Represents date and time data ranging in value from January 1, 4712 BC to December 31, 4712 AD.

remarks.format:
## Remarks To obtain an OracleDateTime object, call the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleDataReader.GetOracleDateTime%2A> method.
The minimum valid date for an OracleDateTime structure is 1/1/0001 00:00:00. However, Oracle supports dates as early as January 1, 4712 BC. To bind BC dates, use a `String` parameter and the Oracle TO_DATE or TO_CHAR conversion functions for input and output parameters respectively.

Docs.param: The object to be compared.

A signed number indicating the relative values of the instance and the object.
Return value
Condition
Less than zero
This structure is less than the object.
Zero
This structure is the same as the object.
Greater than zero
This structure is greater than the object,
object is a null reference ( in Visual Basic)
